item.title: Logo
item.description: Logo The Logo-Scene is the first scene executed on startup. It displays the shiny EasyRPG Logo :) and waits for three seconds. After the wait time it will push the Title-Scene on the stack. Known Issues The logo scene is usually not showing the fade out. That’s because the Title-Scene parses the database which is a blocking operation. This causes a frameskip in the graphic system. Files scene_logo.cpp scene_logo.h

item.title: Title
